name: Lady Annabelle

skills.name: Covetous Nails
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit heals this Champion by 3% of their MAX HP.

effects.notes: 2-hit attack. 2.4 ATK per hit base (2.88 ATK booked with +20% damage). Total: 4.8 ATK base, 5.76 ATK booked.
Self-heal 3% Lady Annabelle MAX HP per hit (2 hits = 6% total). At 50K HP: 3K self-heal per A1 cycle. Excellent sustain with passive (50% heal on any death).

skills.book_value: Low-Medium: +20% damage. Heal not improved by books but A1 sustain good.
skills.notes: 2-hit A1 with 6% MAX HP self-heal (3% per hit). Build 50000+ HP for max sustain (3K heal/turn + 25K passive heal on death). Good for auto sustain with passive synergy.

skills.name: Captivator
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Leech] debuff for 2 turns. Also has a 75% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns on targets with less than 50% Turn Meter.

effects.notes: AoE attack. 4.4 ATK base (5.28 ATK booked with +20% damage).
75% chance Leech debuff for 2 turns base (100% booked). AoE Leech for team sustain. Excellent for waves and boss fights.
75% chance Dec SPD (30%) for 2 turns base (100% booked), CONDITIONAL on enemy <50% TM. TM-gated debuff = unreliable in fast fights but excellent for TM-locked teams.

skills.book_value: HIGH: +25% debuff chance (75%→100%) + -1 cooldown (4→3). MUST BOOK for 100% Leech uptime.
skills.notes: AoE Leech (100% booked) + conditional Dec SPD (<50% TM). MUST BOOK for 3-turn cooldown + 100% debuff chance. Leech EXCELLENT for team sustain (dungeons, FW). Dec SPD unreliable (TM condition) but good for TM-controlled teams. 200+ ACC needed.

skills.name: Sanguine Exchange
skills.description: Swaps HP with a target ally. If this Champion's HP is equal to or higher than the target's after the swap, places a [Revive On Death] buff on the target ally for 2 turns. If this Champion's HP is lower than the target's after the swap, places a [Revive on Death] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. Also places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

effects.notes: UNIQUE HP SWAP: Swaps current HP% with target ally. If Lady Annabelle HP ≥ target after swap → target gets Revive on Death. If Lady Annabelle HP < target after swap → Lady Annabelle gets Revive on Death. CHEESE POTENTIAL: Swap low HP ally to full HP (Lady Annabelle takes low HP) → passive heals Lady Annabelle 50% on next death. Can save dying ally while activating passive self-heal.

Revive on Death buff (2 turns) placed conditionally: If Lady Annabelle HP ≥ target after swap → target gets buff. If Lady Annabelle HP < target after swap → Lady Annabelle gets buff. Revive on Death: 30% HP + Inc SPD (30%, 2 turns) on revive. Strategic swap for revive protection.
30% Inc SPD buff for all allies for 2 turns. Team-wide speed boost unconditional.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: -2 cooldown (6→4). MUST BOOK for HP swap + Revive on Death uptime.
skills.notes: UNIQUE HP SWAP MECHANIC: Swaps current HP with ally + conditional Revive on Death (2 turns, 30% HP revive) + Inc SPD (30%, 2 turns) for team. MUST BOOK for 4-turn cooldown. CHEESE POTENTIAL: Save dying ally by swapping to full HP (Lady Annabelle takes low HP) → passive heals 50% on next death. EXCELLENT for Arena (7/10) and Faction Wars (8/10) with strategic HP manipulation. Revive on Death = safety net for key champion.

skills.name: The Red Lady
skills.description: Heals this Champion by 50% of their MAX HP whenever an ally or enemy dies.

effects.notes: CHEESE PASSIVE: Heals 50% Lady Annabelle MAX HP on ANY death (ally OR enemy). At 50K HP: 25K heal per death. Stacks with A1 self-heal (6% per turn). EXCELLENT sustain for long fights (FW, Doom Tower). CHEESE POTENTIAL: Use A3 HP swap to take low HP → trigger death → 50% heal. Or pair with suicide champions for infinite healing.

skills.notes: CHEESE PASSIVE: 50% MAX HP heal on ANY death (ally/enemy). At 50K HP: 25K heal. Combined with A1 (6% heal) = extreme sustain. CHEESE SYNERGY: A3 HP swap to low HP → take damage → death triggers 50% heal. EXCELLENT for Faction Wars (8/10) and Doom Tower (7/10) with wave sustain.

forms.aura: Increases Ally HP in Faction Crypts by 33%
forms.comments: UNIQUE HP swap specialist with Revive on Death mechanic. A3 'Sanguine Exchange' swaps HP with ally + conditional Revive on Death (2 turns) + Inc SPD (30%). Passive 'The Red Lady' heals 50% MAX HP on ANY death (ally/enemy). A2 'Captivator' AoE Leech (100% booked) + conditional Dec SPD (<50% TM). EXCELLENT for Faction Wars (8/10) with +33% HP aura + sustain. Good for Doom Tower (7/10) and Arena (7/10). Must book A2/A3.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: Low priority. If used: 220+ SPD, 50000+ HP (passive heal value), 200+ ACC (Leech). Revive mechanics not useful in CB. 4/10 CB rating.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: PRIORITY: 50000+ HP (A1 + passive heal value), 220+ SPD (Leech cycling), 200+ ACC (Leech debuff), 2000+ DEF (survivability). A2 Leech excellent for team sustain. Immortal or Speed sets.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: PRIORITY: 50000+ HP (HP swap value + passive sustain), 220+ SPD (Inc SPD buff + HP swap timing), 200+ ACC (Leech), 2000+ DEF, 150+ RES. A3 HP swap + Revive on Death for strategic plays. Speed or Immortal sets.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: PRIORITY: 50000+ HP (CRITICAL for A1 + passive heal value), 220+ SPD, 200+ ACC (Leech), 2000+ DEF, 100+ RES. +33% HP Faction aura EXCELLENT. A2 Leech + passive sustain (50% heal on death) + A3 HP swap for wave/boss survival. MUST BOOK A2/A3.

recommended_gear: Immortal (HP + sustain synergy with A1 + passive)
Speed (220+ SPD for Leech/HP swap cycling)

clan_boss: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER (2-hit A1 for extra procs)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution, DETERRENCE (tanky support)
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (reduces A2/A3 cooldowns), EVIL EYE (Leech extension)
dungeons: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution, DETERRENCE

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (CRITICAL - reduces A2 4→3 booked, A3 6→4 booked cooldowns), EVIL EYE (extends Leech debuff 2→3 turns), LASTING GIFTS (extends Inc SPD buff)
arena: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, DETERRENCE
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (faster A2/A3 cycling), LASTING GIFTS (extends Inc SPD + Revive on Death buff duration)
faction_wars: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Retribution, DETERRENCE (tanky support for survivability), UNSHAKEABLE (+50 RES for debuff resistance)

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (CRITICAL - faster A2 Leech + A3 HP swap cycling), EVIL EYE (CRITICAL - extends Leech 2→3 turns for wave sustain), LASTING GIFTS (extends Inc SPD buff)
masteries.general: WARMASTER for all content (2-hit A1 for extra procs). Cycle of Magic CRITICAL (reduces A2 4→3 booked, A3 6→4 booked cooldowns for Leech + HP swap uptime). Evil Eye CRITICAL for FW/dungeons (extends Leech 2→3 turns for massive team sustain). Lasting Gifts (extends Inc SPD + Revive on Death buff duration). Deterrence (tanky support survivability). Unshakeable (+50 RES for debuff resistance). MUST BOOK A2/A3 for 3-turn Leech, 4-turn HP swap + Revive on Death. Build: 50000+ HP (A1 6% heal, passive 50% heal on death), 220+ SPD (Leech/HP swap cycling), 200+ ACC (Leech debuff), 2000+ DEF. Immortal or Speed sets. Focus: Faction Wars (8/10) with +33% HP aura + Leech sustain + passive heal. Good for Doom Tower (7/10) and Arena (7/10) with HP swap + Revive on Death tactics. User Priority: Arena/Support (Priority 4) - Lady Annabelle is UNIQUE for Faction Wars with HP swap + sustain mechanics. Spirit affinity = neutral vs Force/Magic, weak to Void.

blessings: Brimstone (if used in HP Burn teams - unlikely)

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Good AI. Will use A3 HP swap strategically, A2 for Leech, A1 for sustain. Passive auto-triggers. No major issues.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: CHEESE POTENTIAL: A3 HP swap + passive heal (50% on death) creates strategic sustain loop. COMBO 1: Swap low HP ally to full HP (Lady Annabelle takes low HP) → Lady Annabelle takes damage → death triggers 50% heal (25K at 50K HP) + Revive on Death (30% HP revive if swapped). COMBO 2: Build 50K+ HP → A1 heals 6% (3K/turn) + passive 50% (25K on ANY death) = extreme sustain for Faction Wars/Doom Tower waves. Passive triggers on ally OR enemy death = consistent healing in long fights. Pair with suicide champions (Soulbond Bowyer, etc.) for infinite passive heals. EXCELLENT for Banner Lords FW with +33% HP aura (effective 66.5K HP at 50K base = 33K passive heal).

mechanics_advisory: UNIQUE HP swap specialist with Revive on Death + sustain mechanics. A3 'Sanguine Exchange' is PRIMARY MECHANIC: Swaps current HP% with ally + conditional Revive on Death (2 turns, 30% HP revive) + Inc SPD (30%, 2 turns) for team. Revive on Death placement conditional: If Lady Annabelle HP ≥ target after swap → target gets buff. If Lady Annabelle HP < target after swap → Lady Annabelle gets buff. MUST BOOK for 4-turn cooldown. CHEESE MECHANIC: Save dying ally by swapping to full HP (Lady Annabelle absorbs low HP) → Lady Annabelle death triggers passive 50% heal. Passive 'The Red Lady' is SUSTAIN ENGINE: Heals 50% MAX HP on ANY death (ally OR enemy). At 50K HP: 25K heal per death. Stacks with A1 self-heal (6% per turn = 3K at 50K HP). A2 'Captivator' is TEAM SUSTAIN: AoE Leech (100% booked) + conditional Dec SPD (100% booked, <50% TM). MUST BOOK for 3-turn cooldown + 100% debuff chance. CRITICAL for FW/dungeons with Leech team sustain. MUST BOOK A2/A3 for FW/Arena viability (3-turn Leech, 4-turn HP swap). EXCELLENT for Faction Wars (8/10) with +33% HP aura + Leech + passive sustain. Good for Doom Tower (7/10) and Arena (7/10) with HP swap tactics. Build: 50000+ HP (heal value + HP swap effectiveness), 220+ SPD (Leech/HP swap cycling), 200+ ACC (Leech debuff), 2000+ DEF. Immortal or Speed sets. Warmaster for A1. Cycle of Magic (faster cycling). Evil Eye (extends Leech 2→3). Lasting Gifts (extends buffs). User Priority: Arena/Support (Priority 4) - Lady Annabelle is UNIQUE for Banner Lords FW with HP swap + sustain. Spirit affinity = neutral vs most, weak to Void.
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: UNIQUE HP swap + sustain specialist for Faction Wars. A3 HP swap + Revive on Death. Passive 50% heal on ANY death. A2 AoE Leech (100% booked). Must book A2/A3. User priority: Banner Lords FW with +33% HP aura.

update_notes.last_patch: Completed from DRAFT with full effects, masteries, and meta analysis. Faction Wars + Arena focus. Validated against Ayumilove/HellHades. RaidWiki unavailable (500 error), stats from Ayumilove OCR.

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Stats from Ayumilove OCR (HP 20310, ATK 881, DEF 1068, SPD 100, C.DMG 50). Missing C.RATE (assumed 15%), RES (assumed 30%), ACC (assumed 0). RaidWiki unavailable (500 error). 85% confidence.
